title: Senior Capstone Project
description: Developed a secure, full-stack web application for the U.S. Department of Defense, emphasizing data-driven decision-making and strict security standards.

title: SWE Projects
description: Developed multiple software projects, including a bookstore system, dynamic Ping Pong game, pizza ordering, and bug tracking tools, using GUI-based interfaces.

title: Turtle Project - Python
description: Developed an interactive Python-based Turtle Graphics animation where the turtle explores vacation spots like California & Washington, then builds homes, and enjoys nature.
